page.title: 06Recreation (cont)
page.content:
learn woodcraft, first aid and many other useful things. We have two patrols, Kingfisher and Robin. We also go on camp where we live in tents and do our own cooking.
{Passport to Leisure In Nuneaton, we have a scheme called Passports to leisure. Children pay Â£1.50 and are given a plastic card with their photograph and number on. We can use this to get into places like the swimming baths,tennis courts and sports centres free of charge. Adults can also have a Passport. They cannot get into places free but can book courts an advance free of charge and sometimes they get into things cheaper. We have 3 Leisure Centres in Nuneaton - The Pingles,Etone and the Jubilee Centre.
